text: Witów () is a village in the administrative district of Gmina Lewin Kłodzki, within Kłodzko County, Lower Silesian Voivodeship, in south-western Poland. It lies approximately south-east of Lewin Kłodzki, west of Kłodzko, and south- west of the regional capital Wrocław. The village has a population of 16. ==References== Category:Villages in Kłodzko County
title: Witów, Lower Silesian Voivodeship
